item.title: Why Demand a SAS 70 Type II Data Center?
item.description:
When choosing a cloud or colocation provider, prioritize data privacy and security, especially in regulated sectors like healthcare and finance. A facility with SAS 70 Type II compliance can offer this assurance. SAS 70, based on the American Institute of Certified Public Accountants (AICPA) Statement on Auditing Standards No. 70, Service Organizations, involves a rigorous audit of a company’s data handling practices by an independent firm. This audit results in a comprehensive written report...
Read The Full Article :https://Nexus-Security.github.io/why-demand-a-sas-70-type-ii-data-center/

item.title: When Broadband is Hard to Find
item.description:
For businesses in bustling city centers, finding network and telecom services is usually not a problem. The challenge is finding the best deals on connectivity, trunk lines, and cloud services, as there might be lesser-known options available. However, for businesses in rural areas or home offices, options might seem limited and expensive. Surprisingly, there might be more bandwidth choices than you realize. Traditional Telecommunications Services Businesses with commercial addresses can typically access services like POTS phone service and T1 lines, using existing copper cable infrastructure...
Read The Full Article :https://Nexus-Security.github.io/when-broadband-is-hard-to-find/
